topics.body:
"@And Brother I Hurt People":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54e0a8986368724f05030900#post_54e0a8986368724f05030900
It's actually against the creation of a movie based on Islamic religion of sorts.
I don't really understand it since my mom won't explain it to me.
Probably because she doesn't want me to search it on the web.

Which is why I can't use Google too.
topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976

topics.body:
"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54e0aa336368724cca1e1100#post_54e0aa336368724cca1e1100

Well, then that's kind of bullshit. You should be able to form your own opinions on what you're boycotting.

And no offense, but I seriously doubt that Google or YT is going to take a hit.
topics.author: 5041b54f7f123b77af00a442

topics.body:
"@And Brother I Hurt People":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54e0aac76368720a28730600#post_54e0aac76368720a28730600
None taken.

I just think that the boycotting thing is stupid. Though, I should do what my mom says. The next day, I'll search for that movie.
topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976

topics.body:
"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54e0ac26636872423eb20600#post_54e0ac26636872423eb20600

You could use incognito mode, depending on your browser. Then your mom can't see your browsing history. 

Unless she's using one of those programs that traces every single one of your keystrokes.
topics.author: 5041b54f7f123b77af00a442

topics.body:
"@And Brother I Hurt People":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54e0aca06368723fb6bc1700#post_54e0aca06368723fb6bc1700
Nah, she's not a tech whiz. She needs help connecting to WiFi.

But I think I'll keep that in mind. Incognito mode sounds good.

[spoiler](Now I wonder why people who watch porn never use that mode.)[/spoiler]

Kind of a change of pace since either we'll be cave manning it up or going over to my aunt's house for the night.

topics.body:
I will never NEVER going to a bar with my friends in a Valentine Day in my life.

It's humiliating and everybody is fighting for stealing a random girl from somewhere.

They were so _desperate_ for love, that one of my friends were almost beaten up because was stealing the gf of other guy. That, and with alcohol, make it worse.
And cocaine.

topics.body:
"@And Brother I Hurt People":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54e0c40c6368724be8ee0800#post_54e0c40c6368724be8ee0800
Ugh it was a long wait to get out of it.

I had to wait for my friend because he was waiting to another friend that was waiting for another friend that was trapped in the bathroom. We are cool with each another and it was bad to leave someone there, so we wait for everyone and 30 mins later we finally leave that bar.

The place was good, the only think that sucks was the bathrooms.
